misalignments.reasoning: Statistics Bar completely missing from dashboard. Spec requires three metrics (total tasks count, completed tasks count, completion percentage) displayed with cards/boxes for visual separation, but dashboard only contains Header, TaskInput, and TaskList components with no statistics implementation whatsoever.

Password validation (minimum 6 characters) completely missing from registration. The validatePassword function exists in validation.ts and is imported in register/route.ts but is never called. No password length validation occurs on either client-side (register/page.tsx) or server-side (register/route.ts), allowing users to register with any password length.
